so what to buy...

item.source: Should i buy Mw3 or Bf3 ( Or both)?

item.title: Should i buy Mw3 or Bf3 ( Or both)?
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:66, topic:421388”][quote author=nacional link=topic=524050.msg3818389#msg3818389 date=1321561649]
I did turn up the brightness and it’s still pretty dark. It has more to do with the scheme they used in this game which is just dark and grimy like black ops.
I do use the flak jacket specialization and it’s pretty useless I’m guessing it only works well against noobtubes, they are also pretty hard to spot.
Yeah I really hope they fix that for flashlights also you can blind the hell out of your teammates which is pretty annoying.
Yeah the scar-h is pretty overpowered now that you mention it.
I didn’t even say there was more camping bf3?
[/quote]

  1. I have no problem with darkness. Everything is pretty bright for me, almost sometimes to the point you are blinded. The only dark places are the ones that are intended to…Op Metro, buildings, etc.

  2. Seems to work for me. I use it on support and definitely don’t die as frequently.

  3. I get annoyed by teammates blinding you as well, but yeah they are fixing them to not be bright in daylight.

  4. SCAR-H is getting nerfed in the next patch as well I’m pretty sure.

  5. I know, I was just saying because TDM has a lot of campers in it and sometimes objective-based games do too.[/quote]

well I hope for the patch to come soon. I do hope they also make the flakjacket stronger since it hasn’t worked for me :S.
yeah also looking anywhere near the sun blinds me. Also don’t get me wrong, the game is very fun but I just don’t find it to be worth
60 bucks(good thing I didn’t pay that )
@frell It’s on the pc and I have messed with the settings.
@krackkid stop being such a fan boy :s

Read full topic

I didn’t even say there was more camping bf3?[/quote]

  1. I have no problem with darkness. Everything is pretty bright for me, almost sometimes to the point you are blinded. The only dark places are the ones that are intended to…Op Metro, buildings, etc.

item.source: Should i buy Mw3 or Bf3 ( Or both)?

item.title: Should i buy Mw3 or Bf3 ( Or both)?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:59, topic:421388”]I’ll list some things I hate about bf3s multiplayers. everything is fucking dark, flashlights,claymores,at a disadvantage if you are lower level, tdm maps
are terrific for camping. and lots of campings which is in every game unfortunately. I’ve yet to play mw3 but I guess it’s the same as it’s previous successors.[/quote]

Darkness: Turn your brightness up. It’s a setting on the start menu.

Claymores: I have died maybe 5 times from claymores and I’m in the level 20s. I use them myself and if placed wrong, they won’t kill you in one explosion. Like CoD, you can only have 2 on the map at once. Use the flak jacket perk on your kit if you’re having a problem with them.

Flashlights: Getting changed to be close to useless in daylight in the next patch.

Lower level: Not really. You unlock the SCAR-H pretty early in the game, and not to mention starting with the M16.

TDM: Yes, a lot of TDM can be like that. Learn to play the maps and you won’t run into as many. Defending the objective in Rush and Conquest can be different. However no one can say that MW3 is better in terms of camping, because look at their retarded 28 killstreaks.

Read full topic
